page.title: 09Wykham Mill :Banbury
page.content:
Wykham Mill is in the valley of {Sor Brook}. It is roughly {half-way between Banbury and Bloxham}. It is used now to make {animal feed}. Ten people work there when all the staff are there. Wykham Mill supplies animal feed to the Midlands and {seed corn} to the whole country. There are some machines but not many as it is not fully automatic. Men still have to do all the bagging work. The mill also sell {fertiliser and sprays}. They still have an {old water wheel} that turns when the brook is flooded. The mill is now owned by Lamprey & Son.
Sarah Sands
